body_html:
with 930mx, pytorch 0.3.1 wont work. This is because we didn;t ship for CUDA capability 5.0 support in 0.3.1 release.
0.4 release ships with 5.0 support, and hence will work without giving this error.
body_text:
with 930mx, pytorch 0.3.1 wont work. This is because we didn;t ship for CUDA capability 5.0 support in 0.3.1 release.
0.4 release ships with 5.0 support, and hence will work without giving this error.
body:
with 930mx, pytorch 0.3.1 wont work. This is because we didn;t ship for CUDA capability 5.0 support in 0.3.1 release.
0.4 release ships with 5.0 support, and hence will work without giving this error.
